input_email_body:
Subject: Report of Incident to Support Department Dear Support Team,
An incident involving unauthorized access to unencrypted medical data has been reported You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr..
It is suspected that misconfigured firewall settings might be the cause My name is David Kim..
We have restarted the firewall and reviewed the logs.
Your help in resolving this issue and preventing future incidents is needed.
